resources.string:
Stats 2015

Batches Graduating in 2015:
B.Tech(CSE),M.Tech(CSE),M.Tech(ECE)

Students registered for placement: 190
Number of companies visited: 80(25 A+ and 55 A)
Total Offers: 228 (201 FT + 27 Intern)
Full time(A+ Offers): 53 (CTC => 10 lakhs)
Full time(A Offers): 148 (5 lacs < CTC < 10 lacs)
Indian offers: 228

Highest salary (Indian): 31 lacs for BTech and 25 Lacs for MTech
Average BTech Package: 9.89 lacs
Average MTech(CSE) Package: 8.8 lacs
Overall Average salary: 9.33 lacs (and 75% of the students got offers of > Rs 6L pa)
Percentage % : BTech 98% MTech CSE 91%
